definition: instrument of execution that consists of a weighted blade between two vertical poles, kill by cutting the head off with a guillotine
details:
noun
- instrument of execution that consists of a weighted blade between two vertical poles
- closure imposed on the debate of specific sections of a bill
= synonyms: closure by compartment
verb
- kill by cutting the head off with a guillotine
= example: kill by cutting the head off with a guillotine
